author: pburba
msg: Follow-up to r27764, document another restriction on svn:mergeinfo values.
* subversion/include/svn_mergeinfo.h
(overview of the mergeinfo prop): For now at least we don't consider
svn:mergeinfo valid if revision ranges have start revisions >= end
revisions.  I say "For now" because there is some current consideration
of implementing explicit reversed range svn:mergeinfo.  Also note that
we *don't* currently enforce this anywhere, that is coming shortly as
part of a larger change.

author: glasser
msg: Followup to r27077.  When reparenting in the ra_svn client, allocate
the new session URL in the session's pool, not in some random
temporary pool.  Otherwise we get random memory corruption, wee!
* subversion/libsvn_ra_svn/client.c
(ra_svn_reparent): Allocate long-lived data in a long-lived pool.

author: cmpilato
msg: Merge outstanding revisions from trunk to the 'mergeinfoless-copies' branch.
Merged /trunk:r27818-27847

author: cmpilato
msg: On the 'mergeinfoless-copies' branch, choose the lesser of two merge
management annoyances (but leave code for, and describe, both).
* subversion/libsvn_client/merge.c
(filter_merged_revisions): Describe and leave code for choosing
between two different codepaths, neither perfectly ideal.  But
leave the more-ideal one (in my opinion) live, the other dead.

author: glasser
msg: [This revision finishes the work started in r27846; this log message
covers the changes in both revisions.]
On the sqlite-node-origins branch:
Abstract sqlite functionality that is not specific to mergeinfo out of
mergeinfo-sqlite-index.c and into a new sqlite-util.c.
Create an empty node_origins table (but don't use it yet); this
involved writing code to upgrade a db containing mergeinfo tables but
no node_origin table to have both.  While this is not strictly
necessary for compatibility (because 1.5 is not released yet), this
will both make lives easier for developers now *and* give us an
infrastructure for upgrading the database in future versions.
* subversion/libsvn_fs_util/sqlite-util.c
New.  Move a bunch of functions here (renaming them to
svn_fs__sqlite_*)...
* subversion/libsvn_fs_util/mergeinfo-sqlite-index.c
... from here.
* subversion/libsvn_fs_util/mergeinfo-sqlite-index.h
... and declare them here.
